name: A Midnight Walk
description:
Take a midnight stroll through your local neighborhood. Do some errands, pick up some coffee, and protect yourself from the ongoing psychosis-fueled riots along the way.

After an unknown condition starts manifesting in people across the world, inducing hallucinations of terrible creatures and vague images of others, the world is plunged into constant rioting, as people develop extreme paranoia and attack on sight as a means of self defense. Thankfully, a medicine is soon to be released. Take on the role of an innocent bystander who suffers from this illness as she tries to get through her evening and pick up the medicine on the other side of town.

This game was made for the 2021 Scream Jam hosted by Kitsch Digital. This game will be updated as soon as the voting period ends, so if you have any suggestions for changes, please be sure to let me know.
